works.complaint:
We are authorised to represent HBB Australia in  
relation to all risk services including internet defamation.

a.            The website states: “Software Scam” “HBB Australia is a  
Internet race horse scam,” “HBB is a Scam” “HBB is a Scam ...”

The site suggests that HBB Australia is a scam company and is currently  
operating scams.

b.            HBB Australia has never operated a scam. HBB Australia have  
not been charged, arrested, or convicted of any dishonesty offence. HBB  
Australia would not be involved with any offences of this nature.

This content has been spread through numerous websites with the intention  
to defame HBB Australia

This is a comment designed to harm HBB Australia, a small company employing  
less than 10 people.

c.             These comments harm my reputation in and cause damage to my  
business. The publishers and distributors of this material would be liable  
for civil damages under the Defamation Act 2005 (Qld). Due to the possible  
retaliation, and threat to my safety caused by that the claims that in am  
engaged in criminal enterprises, this violates Criminal defamation sections  
of Criminal Code Act 1899 (Qld).
